summary: A chronicle of the emptiness felt when ones children have left home and there are no longer any barriers to exposing marital difficulties.
cast: Oscar Martínez|Cecilia Roth|Inés Efron|Arturo Goetz|Jean Pierre Noher|Eugenia Capizzano|Ron Richter|Carlos Bermejo|Osmar Núñez|Fabián Arenillas|Roxana Berco|Ana Padilla|Ana Zinski|Alejandro Polledo|Ángela Ragno|Esteban Lamothe|Alejandra Quevedo|Armenia Martinez|Abián Vainstein|Ariel Merszon|Alejandro Abramovich|Rajel Benzion|Hernán Herrera|Gerardo del Águila|Agustina Gutiérrez|Kumiko Itokazu|Omar Biscotti|Carlos Selener|Silvia Feitelevich|Darío Lagos|Beatriz Jmelnitzky
keywords: husband wife relationship|empty nest syndrome|three word title|marital adjustment
title: El nido vacío
